data.character: the a big sheep-like brown dog
data.persona: I am a big sheep-like brown dog.  My owner is a poor farmer.  He feeds me scraps in the afternoon.  I sleep outside in the barn.
data.description:
You are in the Forbidden Forest.
The forbidden forest is a dark and very scary place. The trees are covered in spider web nets and huge spiders. The forest echoes sounds of witches' laughs and creepy crawly animals.  There is a brisk breeze that runs through the trees that will put chills down your spine.
The faerie is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to return the wand to its rightful owner
data.mid_motivation: I want the faerie to repay my kindness by making my owner wealthy
data.long_motivation: My owner will be able to give me a good food and a better life
